Package com.example.synod

Class Process

java.lang.Object
akka.actor.AbstractActor
akka.actor.UntypedAbstractActor
com.example.synod.Process
All Implemented Interfaces:
akka.actor.Actor
public class Process extends akka.actor.UntypedAbstractActor
The Process class represents an actor implementing a distributed consensus algorithm. It communicates with other processes to reach an agreement on a proposed value.

Upon receiving a launch message, the process picks an input value randomly from {0, 1} and invokes instances of propose operation with this value until a value is decided.

      i - ID of the current process.
      alpha - The probability to fail.

      i - ID of the current process.
      alpha - The probability to fail.
      Returns:
      Props instance for creating the actor.

    • propose

      private void propose​(int v)
      Proposes a value to other processes. This method is invoked upon receiving a launch message.
      Parameters:
      v - The value to propose.

    • onReceive

      public void onReceive​(Object message) throws Throwable
      Handles incoming messages received by the actor.
      Specified by:
      onReceive in class akka.actor.UntypedAbstractActor
      Parameters:
      message - The message received.
      Throws:
      Throwable - If an error occurs during message handling.

    • decideHandler

      private void decideHandler​(Decide message, akka.actor.ActorRef sender)
      Handles a Decide message received from another process. Once a value is decided, it stops listening for messages and informs other processes.
      Parameters:
      message - The Decide message containing the decided value.
      sender - The sender of the Decide message.

    • ackHandler

      private void ackHandler​(Ack message, akka.actor.ActorRef sender)
      Handles an Ack message received from another process. If received from a majority of processes, it informs other processes of the decided value and schedules termination of the system.
      Parameters:
      message - The Ack message.
      sender - The sender of the Ack message.

    • imposeHandler

      private void imposeHandler​(Impose message, akka.actor.ActorRef sender)
      Handles an Impose message received from another process. It checks if the received ballot is valid and updates the estimate if necessary. Then it sends an Ack or Abort message accordingly.
      Parameters:
      message - The Impose message containing the ballot and proposal.
      sender - The sender of the Impose message.

    • gatherHandler

      private void gatherHandler​(Gather message, akka.actor.ActorRef sender)
      Handles a Gather message received from another process during the read phase. It collects states from other processes and upon receiving a majority, selects the proposal with the highest ballot and sends an Impose message to all processes.
      Parameters:
      message - The Gather message containing the ballot and estimate.
      sender - The sender of the Gather message.

    • abortHandler

      private void abortHandler​(Abort message, akka.actor.ActorRef sender)
      Handles an Abort message received from another process. It does nothing in response to an Abort message.
      Parameters:
      message - The Abort message.
      sender - The sender of the Abort message.

    • readHandler

      private void readHandler​(Read r, akka.actor.ActorRef sender)
      Handles a Read message received from another process. It checks if the received ballot is valid and sends a Gather or Abort message accordingly.
      Parameters:
      r - The Read message containing the ballot.
      sender - The sender of the Read message.
